scripts.test:circleci: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=test     npx nyc     npx -c "mocha --reporter=mocha-junit-reporter"
scripts.test:node: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=test     npx mocha --watch --watch-extensions ts"
scripts.test:browser: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=test     npx karma start
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:node && npm run coverage:browser
scripts.coverage:node: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=test     npx nyc     npx -c "mocha"
scripts.coverage:browser: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=test COVERAGE=y     npx karma start
